medical_history.chief_complaint: Left-sided weakness and aphasia that cleared in 2 to 3 hours.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 10 days prior to admission. The left-sided weakness and aphasia resolved quickly at a suburban hospital but had episodes of sweating, nausea, blurred vision, tremors, and insomnia since July 1974, with gradual worsening and recurrent episodes including transient right-sided weakness.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Mild hyperthyroidism, history of two episodes of weakness and tremor, hysterectomy for fibroids, and significant weight loss (9.1 kg in 6 months).
medical_history.family_history: Father and mother-in-law died from cerebrovascular accidents.
